title: St. Louis Cardinals font - MLB baseball logo
content:
Any suggestions on where can I find the font of the word "Cardinals" on their logo?  
Also the names and numbers on the back?

[http://shop.mlb.com/graphics/product\_images/pMLB2-1026574dt.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323000454/http:/shop.mlb.com/graphics/product_images/pMLB2-1026574dt.jpg "http://shop.mlb.com/graphics/product\_images/pMLB2-1026574dt.jpg")

Anything that might come pretty close will be greatly appreciated.

[joshua4u2@hotmail.com](mailto:joshua4u2@hotmail.com)
author: joshua4u2

comments.content: It's highly doubtful that any logo used at a level like MLB is going to be using off-the-shelf typefaces. It's likely a hand-drawn custom face.

If you are looking for something pretty close try team spirit and sports jersey both free fonts found on-line

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323000454im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cardinals_3871.JPG)

with some modification (esp. on the 'C') you might also try Fenway Park:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jawfonts/fenway-park-jf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323000454/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jawfonts/fenway-park-jf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jawfonts/fenway-park-jf/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323000454im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cards_3604.jpg)
Thanks for all your posts...unfortunately, it is the "C" that I wish to obtain...
